Author Correction: Discovery of an exosite on the SOCS2-SH2 domain that enhances SH2 binding to phosphorylated ligands
Edmond M. Linossi, Kunlun Li, Gianluca Veggiani, Cyrus Tan, Farhad Dehkhoda, Colin Hockings, Dale J. Calleja , Narelle Keating, Rebecca Feltham , Andrew J. Brooks , Shawn S. Li , Sachdev S. Sidhu , Jeffrey J. Babon , Nadia J. Kershaw & Sandra E. Nicholson
The original version of this article contained an error in Table 2, in which the original bottom 5 rows showed the incorrect values. The correct version of Table 2 is:
Location GHR pY595 (μM) F3 (μM) GHR pY595 + F3 (μM)*
SOCS2 mutation
WT 1.08 ±0.07 0.67 ±0.03 0.15 ± 0.02 L36A ESS 0.80 ±0.02 ND1 0.50±0.02 L40F 1.03 ±0.07 0.81 ± 0.02 0.29±0.02 L40A 1.76 ± 0.21 >50 0.46±0.08 R41A 1.18 ± 0.54 0.89 ± 0.05 0.25 ± 0.07 Q45A 1.32 ± 0.03 0.60 ±0.34 0.22± 0.03 Y49F βA 0.98 ± 0.01 0.79 ±0.01 0.18 ± 0.01 Y99A βD 2.03 ±0.05 ND 1.84±0.4 L81F βC 1.88 ± 0.01 ND 1.75 ± 0.27 L82F βC 1.17 ± 0.04 1.53 ± 0.03 0.45 ± 0.02 L81, 82F βC 0.93 ± 0.34 ND 1.94±0.27
which replaces the previous incorrect version:
Location GHR pY595 (μM) F3 (μM) GHR pY595 + F3 (μM)*
SOCS2 mutation
WT 1.08 ±0.07 0.67 ±0.03 0.15 ± 0.02 L36A ESS 0.80 ±0.02 ND1 0.50±0.02 L40F 1.03 ±0.07 0.81 ± 0.02 0.29±0.02 L40A 1.76 ± 0.21 >50 0.46±0.08 R41A 1.18 ± 0.54 0.89 ± 0.05 0.25 ± 0.07 Q45A 1.32 ± 0.03 0.60 ±0.34 0.22± 0.03 Y49F βA 0.98 ± 0.01 0.79 ±0.01 0.18 ± 0.01 S78A BC loop 2.03 ±0.05 ND 1.84±0.4 Y99A βD 1.88 ± 0.01 ND 1.75 ± 0.27 L81F βC 1.17 ± 0.04 1.53 ± 0.03 0.45 ± 0.02 L82F βC 0.93 ± 0.34 ND 1.94±0.27 L81, 82F βC 1.08 ±0.07 0.67 ±0.03 0.15 ± 0.02
Correction to: Nature Communications https://doi.org/10.1038/s41467-021-26983-5, published online 02 December 2021
